title: Airplane business class doors offer new levels of privacy. Not everyone thinks they're a good idea
description: Business class is becoming increasingly more luxurious, spacious and private. Whether it's custom-designed seat and bed cushions, bespoke fittings and fixtures, or co-branding with some of the biggest names in luxury, business really is the new first class aboard many planes.

title: Best fashion at the MTV Video Music Awards 2022
description: The 2022 MTV Video Music Awards got underway Sunday evening, with stars including Lizzo and Blackpink stepping out onto the red carpet for the big night.
